description:
All the Gain with Little of the Pain: Why Most New Projects Should
Implement a Custom User Model -

Substituting a custom User model for Django's default User model can
seem intimidating. I'll show you a simple 3 step method of implementing
a custom User model for a new project that's actually quite easy to do
and can provide tremendous benefits in flexibility and customization.
title: Why Most New Projects Should Implement a Custom User Model
